entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-06
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Revise pthread_condattr_setclock on Android #58737
    6.0.0
  • Reconsider conversion operators `Date` <-- > `DateTime` #58734
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add Unsafe.AsOut method to simplify out parameters casting #58732
  • Serial Port support on Android #58740
  • Assertion failed 'block->countOfInEdges() > 0' during 'Remove empty finally' with infinite loop in finally #58729
  • Test failure: GetAsyncWithRedirect_SetCookieContainer_CorrectCookiesSent #58725
    Future
  • Test failure: KeepAlivePingDelay_Infinite_NoKeepAlivePingIsSent #58724
    Future
  • Https against invalid domain names (containing underscores) behaves differently on Linux than Windows and macOS #58722
  • [API Proposal]: Hide and obsolete `TypedReference.SetTypedReference`. #58721
  • StopAsync of BackgroundServices is called sequentially #58715
  • Consider stripping \\?\ from AppDomain.CurrentDomain.BaseDirectory #58714
  • StreamReader.ReadLineAsync cannot quit even if Close() is called. #58713
  • Consider Uri .ctor to allow for paths starting with \\?\ #58712
  • [wasm] Wasm.Build.Test failure on windows #58709
    7.0.0
  • [wasm][aot] Windows: Test failures for `System.Globalization.Extensions.Tests` #58708
  • [wasm][aot] Windows: Test failures for `System.IO.FileSystem.Tests` #58707
  • Mono does not consider cgroup constraints when determining memory sizes #58706
    7.0.0
  • Certificate SHA1withRSA encryption method dotnet Framework and dotnet core calculation results are inconsistent #58705
  • Test failure SampleSynthesisTests.SynthesizeRecognizeTests.SpeechSynthesizerToSpeechRecognitionEngine #58704
  • Test failure Regressions/coreclr/GitHub_45929/test45929/test45929.sh #58702
  • Test failure readytorun/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism/coreroot_determinism.sh #58699

Closed

  • Intermittent deadlock in .NET 5.0.5 while attached to debugger #52379
    Future
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices - Undoc 6.0 APIs #58656
    6.0.0
  • In .NET 6, Preview 7, having a property name with space and using JsonSourceGenerationOptions causes errors in generated files #58580
  • Using `ToastNotificationManagerCompat` etc. with .NET 5 #58697
  • STJ Source Generator generates invalid code with value tuples #58137
    6.0.0
  • stackalloc behavior with constant size that isn't a power of 2 #55001
    7.0.0
  • [Libraries][iOS/MacCatalyst/tvOS] IsIanaIdTest fails from mismatched expectation #58440
    7.0.0
  • Reading configuration settings fails with System.UriFormatException: 'Invalid URI: The hostname could not be parsed.' #56897
    6.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Windows 8 detection. #58736
    area-System.Security
  • [System.IO.Hashing] Expose methods to get 32-bits and 64-bits hash values #58735
    area-System.IO
  • Expose nint/nuint overloads for BitOperations #58733
    area-System.Numerics
  • Avoid S.S.Permissions dependency in S.S.Crypto.Xml #58731
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • [wasm] WebSocket perf test #58730
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 7.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Fix pause on exception behavior #58728
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Better codegen for `(T)x | (T)y` #58727
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Align preallocationSize behavior #58726
    area-System.IO
  • [release/6.0] Fix source generation support for tuples with explicitly named elements #58723
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Always write sample events in EventPipe based on sample frequency. #58720
    area-Tracing-mono
  • [mono] Disable tests relying on precise GC #58719
  • [release/6.0] add TLS 1.3 support to WinHttp #58718
    area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • Add test for implicit time zone conversion for mobile platforms #58717
  • PosixSignalRegistrationTests.Unix: validate signal pal mapping #58711
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [release/6.0] Make sure EventPipe streaming thread won't write session->streaming_thread after session free. #58710
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Fix building GC on Android #58703
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Move Android SDK logic to /eng #58700
    area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Fix HAVE_PTHREAD_CONDATTR_SETCLOCK detection on Android #58701
    area-System.Threading
  • Fix source generation support for tuples with explicitly named elements #58644
    area-System.Text.Json, 6.0.0
  • Allow instrumentation for methods with explicit tail calls #58632
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Remove redundant zeroing for small stackallocs with SkipLocalsInit #55004
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Skip covariant store checks when jit sees exact Array's type #58696
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Libraries] Fix TimeZoneInfoTests IsIanaIdTest for iOS/MacCatalyst/tvOS #58562
  • [libraries] Restrict ILLink Suppression xml to mobile platforms #58519
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Fix ConfigurationManager when BaseDirectory starts with \\?" #58627
    area-System.Configuration
  • Make sure EventPipe streaming thread won't write session->streaming_thread after session free. #58615
    area-Tracing-coreclr

Updated

  • Add tizen armel build CI for pull request #56281
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Make GCMemoryInfoData blittable #58738
    area-System.Memory
  • Update ELT profiler tests to include tests when a function returns HFA/HVA struct on Arm64 #54912
    arch-arm64, area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Add documentation to System.Net #57855
    area-System.Net.Http, community-contribution
  • [iOS] Make sure IPGlobalProperties and NetworkInterface.GetIsNetworkAvailable methods return the correct info #57096
    * NO MERGE *, area-System.Net, os-ios, 7.0.0
  • [DRAFT][wasm] WebSocket improve send buffers #58199
    arch-wasm, area-System.Net
  • Simplify .NETFramework tfms #58558
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 7.0.0
  • Send RST_STREAM instead EOF when sending request body is cancelled #58548
    area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.0
  • Spannified internals of BigInteger #35565
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Support JsonConverterFactory with src-gen #58652
    area-System.Text.Json
  • removed argument requestId from loopbackserver.cs #58678
    area-System.Net
  • [release/6.0] add Http3LoopbackConnection.ShutdownAsync and use in AcceptConnectionAsync #58336
    area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.0
  • [release/6.0] Increase some of the DnsEndPointTest timeouts #58617
    area-System.Net, 6.0.0
  • FreeBSD fix for AF_UNIX IPC socket permission #58688
  • Improve error messages expanding single-file #58557
    area-Single-File, 7.0.0
  • Add ObjectDisposedException.Throw for object instance and type #58684
    new-api-needs-documentation
  • Don't force using the system libunwind for source-build #58641
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Use arcade power source build infra #58651
    area-Infrastructure
  • DO NOT MERGE: Macos builds on perf measure pool #58514
    * NO MERGE *
  • Fix minor typo in inline comments in Decimal.cs #58694
    area-System.Runtime
  • JIT: Convert Interlocked intrinsics to NamedIntrinsics #55170
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Enable AOT, and Wasm.Build.Tests on windows #58578
    area-Build-mono
